description: This interface defines a simple key-value-store interface

store.description: This command stores a value under a given key

key.description: Key to store the value for

load.description: This command loads the previously stored value for a given key (it will return null if the key does not exist)

key.description: Key to load the value for

delete.description: This command removes the value stored under a given key

key.description: Key to delete the value for

exists.description: This command checks if something is stored under a given key

key.description: Key to check the existence for

result.description: Returns 'True' if something was stored for this key
